data.actual_result: Your scroll position is reset to the top of user settings
data.expected_result: You should still be scrolled down to where the change log is
data.short_description: Closing the image/video in change log resets user settings position
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into user settings and open the Change Log - Tap on the image/video in Change Log - Close out of the image/video and exit the Change Log section - Observe your position in settings
